K10D0271_H0273:80b-8: de dag gtse bar byed mi 'gyur //
K10D0271_H0273:80b-9: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //
K10D0271_H0273:80b-10: dri za lto 'phye che rnams kyis //
K10D0271_H0273:80b-11: glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0271_H0273:80b-12: sangs rgyas 'di dag mi mchog ste //
K10D0271_H0273:80b-13: dpal gyi snying po 'brug gi rgyal //
K10D0271_H0273:80b-14: mdzangs pa bag yod gyur nas ni //
K10D0271_H0273:80b-15: mkhas mi su zhig mtshan mi 'dzin //
K10D0271_H0273:80b-16: 'jig rten mgon po thams cad kyi //
K10D0271_H0273:80b-17: mtshan rnams 'di dag su nyan pa //
K10D0271_H0273:80b-18: mi de dag ni cho gas nyan //
K10D0271_H0273:80b-19: grags ldan rnams kyi mtshan thos nas //
K10D0271_H0273:80b-20: de dag dpa' zhing shes rab che //
K10D0271_H0273:80b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10D0271_H0273:80b-23: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10D0271_H0273:80b-24: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
K10D0271_H0273:80b-28: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10D0271_H0273:80b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10D0271_H0273:80b-30: 'phags pa sangs rgyas brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10D0271_H0273:80b-31: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang /
K10D0271_H0273:80b-33: zhus chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa /
